Honestly, this hentai deserves more attention. This is emergence level plot line and meanwhile Shindol's work wasn't even this deep. The atmosphere was dark, facial expressions were phenomenal and the art actually portrayed what rape could look like along with the consequences although the dudes getting kidnapped made no sense to me.

This hentai was thought provoking, the plot was captivating and the art was consistent and well drawn.

Honestly this hentai never made me hard. My dick was soft throughout the entire read and the wife rape scene was really stressful since it was borderline realistic. This honestly changed my options on hentai since I usually consider hentai as a vanilla fap material only. It sure was great to taste the darker side of hentai once in a while.

I love Shoujo M series so much! I definitely need more serial works like this in my life! Btw, I personally prefer reading works like this in raw japanese more; because the feeling, the atmosphere, and the way the author convey their feelings, are portrayed directly in the way the words in its original languange are assembled.
came here to fap not to feel

@AnimeFanatic11:

Mamiya, Mikage and Mamiya's mother took losses before the story began but ultimately adapted and triumphed on their own terms. Mikage fared better than Mamiya and her mother did though: Mikage got some real closure whereas Mamiya didn't find much catharsis in the end—only validation and a little bit of self-worth. Sensei and Mamiya's father are indisputably broken but really only have themselves to blame given their original sins. Yoriko is the real loser here though, she did absolutely nothing wrong the whole time and had her life and her mind completely destroyed nevertheless. Pretty appropriate ending all in all, if a little unsurprising. The epilogue is truly lovely though.

had nowhere else to go. She proceeds to make his life a living hell as she raises Mamiya.
-Mamiya eventually witnesses Hide raping Mikage and sets her plans in motion based on what she learned from her mother.
-This all basically culminates in Mikage attempting to convince Mamiya to stop being yandere, but Mamiya decides to to stay yandere and parts ways with Mikage.
-The classmate meanwhile tries to report Mamiya and her family to the police, but they don't believe her.
-Yoshika is hospitalized, and Hide's private investigator friend I believe is trying to question her about Hide's whereabouts. Unfortunately, Yoshika is too traumatized by what Hide did to her and she commits suicide.
-Years later, Hide fathers a child with Mamiya, and is subsequently tortured by the mother while Mamiya raises the child.
-Mamiya's daughter starts going to school and somehow ends up in the same school as Mikage's daughter.

crosspost for the story, cause this shit here needs explanation.
So, this is what I've been able to gather up from what I've seen.

-Hide attempts to strangle Mamiya and is caught off guard when Mamiya's mother appears, and is confused why she doesn't intervene.
-Mamiya takes the opportunity to manipulate Hide further by telling him he literally has nowhere else to go and she's the only girl who will love him.
-Hide finally caves and becomes Mamiya's slave/pet.
-Meanwhile, Mikage is still looking for Mamiya when Mamiya appears, the bruises on her neck from the attempted strangling still visible.
-Mamiya then tells Mikage the story of her parents, when her mother got teen pregnant and subsequently dumped by her father. The mother went nuts, kidnapped the father and his new girlfriend, and gave birth right in front of them.
-The mother then went on to ruin the father's reputation, and like what Mamiya did with Hide, manipulated the father into staying with her since he had nowhere else t
Oops, it says Morita on the room plate, so it seems it was the wife who tried to commit suicide.

I guess that the one who tried to commit suicide in the end was the girl's mother not the guy's (ex)wife.
On the other hand, I guess we caught a glimpse of the scumbag's former wife in the end, when he bumps into her without knowing it was her, and she seemed to be leading a happy life after what happened with her previous marriage.
What I can understand from the pictures (since I don't understand japanese at all) is that our main character was born from a fucked up relationship and a scumbag father. Her mother got pregnant when she was still in school, and once her boyfriend found out, he got mad and tried to make her abort, but it seems she didn't do so and he ditched her and got a different girl, which ended up driving her mother insane. Time later, we got to see her mind broken mother about to give birth in front of her former boyfriend and her actual partner. People end up catching on what the man did which kills him socially.
